text: Hello everyone, I'm creating a theme for my company and I need to display recent blog posts on the home page. Does anyone know how to list blog posts on the home page or on another page other than the blog listing page?
you'd need to create a module for blog post preview or similar that uses the blog post hubL to bring in the content
Thanks for answer! Is there any documentation to access to the blog post from the module? I have seen some for the blog listing page but not for other pages

You'll want to have a look at this
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#blog-recent-posts>
